author: ilene
msg: Patch for bugzilla #6071.  Specifically, this patch allows line numbers to
be reported when errors are discovered at runtime in a value-of attribute.

author: zongaro
msg: Bringing XSLTC_DTM branch up-to-date with respect to MAIN

author: zongaro
msg: Set both the localName and QName of an attribute in _attributes - this avoid problems for namespace aware processing of the SAX events further downstream.
This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create branch 'XSLTC_DTM'.

author: zongaro
msg: Applying patch for Bug 9683 for Morris Kwan.  If XRTreeFrag is constructed
without respect to an XPathContext, the object() method should defer to the
parent class's object() method to convert the fragment to the appropriate
